content:
The 4th annual Great Easter Rate Hunt will take place on Sunday, April 1st! 

What is The Great Easter Rate Hunt? It's like an Easter egg hunt, but with super cheap hotel rates! Every year on Easter Sunday, we host an online competition where registered participants hunt our website for one of 80+ super discounted rates across a variety of rooms (yes, even Ocean Front rooms!), some at $1.00 and others at $99! What are the rules After registering for the competition by joining our email list, you will soon receive an email with rules, tips for success and, on Easter Sunday, the official start time! How do I register? Simply join our email list (below) and like us on Facebook!
